fields.description:
1.use *hdfs zkfc* to start a zkfc daemon;
2.zkfc failed to start, but we got the successful code.
fields.summary: DFSZKFailoverController daemon exits with wrong status code

comments.body: Modify the retCode of zkfc, please check, thanks in advance!

Paste some log:
{quote}2017-05-04 16:06:24,720 FATAL org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.tools.DFSZKFailoverController: Got a fatal error, exiting now
